description: This file declares interfaces related to warning reporting control within the WPEFramework, including warning event handling, reporting, and category management.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for warning event objects with methods for serialization, deserialization, categorization, and converting to string.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for managing warning reporting units, including reporting events and category management.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Control interface for warning categories, allowing exclusion, configuration, and cloning.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Exclude a specific category from reporting.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Create a clone of the warning reporting control instance.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Report a warning event with an identifier and event details.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieve information about a specific warning category.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Add a category to the warning reporting list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Remove a category from the warning reporting list.
